name: Bad-Bits
summary: A 2d/3d .NET core and JavaScript powered retro game engine that leverages MonoGame for rendering, and is compatible with Typescript and CommonJS.

name: Age of Chaos
summary: A work in progress game for MS Dos. It uses docker to execute the compiler, and python to manage the build.

name: Mame Miner
summary: A tool to extract unmerged roms from a zip file to be used with the Multiple Arcade Machine Emulator
